short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Archives YouTube playlists and checks for missing videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube stole a video from your playlist?
No thumbnail, title or even channel name left?
YouTube Playlist Rescue will put an end to that!

Quickly record your YouTube Playlists using YouTube API and store them on your computer!
By recording a Playlist again you can check for videos that were deleted/ privatized/ hidden and find them again by their titles or URL!

(WARNING: Videos are archived locally. Deleting your local browser cache will delete your archive!)
